thread.title: Justin Bieber Threatens to Sue Over Naked Photos in Bora Bora
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Threatens to Sue Over Naked Photos in Bora Bora

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Justin Bieber Threatens to Sue Over Naked Photos in Bora Bora
text:
Comments Justin's legal team has sent a cease and desist letter to New York Daily News after nude pictures of the singer during his vacation in Bora Bora began spreading online on Wednesday, October 7. 
Justin Bieber is threatening to sue media outlet who published naked photos of him during his vacation in Bora Bora. His legal team has sent a cease and desist letter to New York Daily News after his nude shots began spreading online on Wednesday, October 7. According to the cease and desist letter obtained by The Hollywood Reporter, Justin's legal team is demanding the removal of the nude pictures from New York Daily News' website within 12 hours. The pictures haven't been removed from the site yet. Justin's legal team says the publication of the nude photos is a violation of the singer's publicity and privacy rights. The photos also infringe on the "What Do You Mean" singer's trademarks. The cease and desist letter acknowledges that the nude photos are indeed Justin's, despite some speculation that the shots were photoshopped to look like him. "We recently became informed that your company has obtained and is distributing unauthorized photographs of our Client including images showing him without clothing," the letter reads.
